Reviews.Title: Delighted with Product.
Reviews.Author: James Broskey
Reviews.Content: All Items arrived as specified, all Pristine. Did not comment prior to using. Sole complaint is excess reflection on Screen, camera issue, not Supplier.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: John C. Hart
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift to my wife and she loves it. We are very impressed with the 30x zoom and the quality of the image. It's size is very convenience.One draw back is that it is difficult to hand hold at high zoom. This could be easily compensated for with a Tri-pod, mono-pod or just bracing. However, the proto quality at 30x is still outstanding and clear even if hard to center at high zoom.  We would recommend this camera to our friends.

Reviews.Title: Pleased... but hesitant.
Reviews.Author: T. Seling
Reviews.Content: I received all the items pictured.. all packaged nice and secure. The camera box itself did not have the Sony security tape and it caused me unease. BUT...everything seems to be working fine and does not appear to be used in any way. As long as everything keeps working, this has been a great value!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good bundle so far, Camera doesn't fit in bag.
Reviews.Author: Dale "kujospam"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  I have not tested the extra batteries yet, so I'll update the review when I do.  The one major problem that I have is that the camera bag can not hold the camera,  The bag is too small, maybe mine is messed up a little bit, and it looks like it might be in one corner.  I recommend buying a separate camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I received my camera only days before I left for a 12 day trip to Israel so I had limited time to "learn" it before I left the country.  It delivered in so many ways--took excellent, high quality/resolution shots in a instant's notice, and was able to move easily through the zoom/tele range in a responsive manner.  One thing that I hated---its "record" and "custom" buttons are where your right thumb wants to naturally sit (especially when taking one handed photos) that it kept screwing me up.  I thought I was going to be able to take a pic, and nothing would happen EXCEPT I'd be recording video (which I didn't want) or have to work my way through the "custom" option.  What a pain...sometimes, I'd have to turn the camera off and back on just to get back to where I wanted to be.  While it might just be me, I have to think that these buttons present problems for others too due to their location.Otherwise, the camera performed as promised and I'm VERY pleased with the quality of the photos, which,in the end is why I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on the bundle!
Reviews.Author: Bernie
Reviews.Content: Most of the reviews have been about the camera and I concur with almost all of them - great zoom capability (30x), terrific photos, cool features (wifi / remote control / GPS), great video and more or less the same gripes - no Raw capability, not crazy about the manual pop-up flash (wish it was automatic), the display is hard to see in bright daylight but I would still recommend this camera.  The bundle came with a Sony 64GB class 10 memory card, a Sony carrying case (I though it was too small but it works), 2 extra batteries, a battery charger, HDMI cable, screen protector, and tripod.  I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: good bundle
Reviews.Author: Edo
Reviews.Content: good bundle ,good camera, the only down side when you take several  video shots it doesn't play them continually like any other video camera, only shot by shot which is really frustrating .

Reviews.Title: Good product , good accessories, good deal.
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: This Sony camera has lots of great features. The package of accessories  will be very handy when I travel..ie: 2 extra batteries and the 64GB SD Memory Card . Price was very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Zoom, Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jenkins
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy for the money. I have used Sony cameras for the past decade or two and this one does not dissapoint.

Reviews.Title: The sony soft carrying case is not for the camera it didn't fit....
Reviews.Author: Juancho
Reviews.Content: the camera and all the accesories where recieved completely, but the only problem was that the sony soft carrying case wasn't for this camera... please help us with this inconvinience....

Reviews.Title: Good value, very impressed so far with camera
Reviews.Author: Sue Whinnery
Reviews.Content: just got this for Christmas so haven't had much time to learn all the camera features but I'm impressed so far. The bundle is a good value except for the case; it's definitely too small.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC HX50 bundle
Reviews.Author: Ross D, Hinman
Reviews.Content: The case is not the correct case for this camera.  There is not a chance you could fit the camera into the case provided with the bundle.  I considered the bundle a good value when purchased, however it is a waste of money.  You end up receiving two mini pods. a boat load of lens cleaning cloths and a brush, so  a waste of money.Buy the camera, and purchase the case elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Everything good but....
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL SALAZAR GONZALEZ
Reviews.Content: I am happy with all de bundle but the case, too small, too tide, I do not think it suits this camera.  All other parts are great. I would gave 5 stars if the case was the right one.  Thank you,

Reviews.Title: A Good Camera But Too Expensive
Reviews.Author: Bob In Alabama
Reviews.Content: A nice camera but a bit expensive for what it does.  The controls are not as intuitive as I expected but easy to use once you get use to them.  The case I received with the camera was too small.  I emailed Focus Camera about it.  They said that they would look into it but I did not hear from them.  After about one month, I gave them a one star rating.  After that, I did hear from them.  They said that Amazon had packaged the order and not them.  Focus did send me one of their own camera cases which is not designed for this camera so it is too big but useable.

ProductInfo.Features:
20.4-megapixels & 30x optical/60x Clear Image zoom
Full HD 1080/60p with dual record
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with 3-way active mode
Up to 10 frames per second
Full manual and dedicated EV control dial and built-in Wi-Fi
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-HX50V/B DSC-HX50, HX50, DSCHX50 Cyber-shot 20.4MP High Zoom Digital Camera Bundle with 64GB SD Memory Card + Memory Card Reader-Writer + Wasabi Power Replacement Battery for Sony NP-BX1 and Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX1 + Soft Carrying Case + 7" Spider Tripod and Accessories
